questions: Unfortunately, <a href='W08/swapi/swapi.html' target='_blank' title='the instructor solution'>the Star Wars API is failing<a/> when it's hosted from a website due to new default security restrictions in Chromium. That's OK because the Pokemon API is much more interesting.
